title: Deutsch Direkt! Eps. 1-10
brief_description: The first ten programs of a twenty part course for beginners in German. Specially filmed and recorded in Germany and Austria the aim is to help you speak simple, everyday language and to understand more complex conversations. As well as introducing the vocabulary the videos also include short documentary sections on various aspects of life in Austria and West Germany. The programs are presented by Hanni Vanhaiden. Audio-cassettes and a course book are also available.
